query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS enrichment_jobs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'processing', 'completed', 'cancelled', 'failed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  totalFiles INT NOT NULL,
  completedFiles INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  failedFiles INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  currentFileId INT,
  fileIds JSON NOT NULL,
  processedFileIds JSON DEFAULT ('[]'),
  failedFileIds JSON DEFAULT ('[]'),
  startedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  lastError TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW() NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW() ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX enrichment_jobs_user_id_idx (userId),
  INDEX enrichment_jobs_status_idx (status)
);
